name: Caprity

ability.name: Berry Picker
ability.description: Sometimes drops Red Berries from its back when assigned to Ranch.

description: The shrub on this pal's back produces berries as long as it is properly fed. It offers these berries to potential mates, and if the flavor is to their liking, romance blossoms.

skills.name: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Power Shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: Grass Tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Spine Vine
skills.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

skills.name: Solar Blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
